tweet.text: Diplomatic and Consular Service officers in Austria-Hungary struggled to enact Department of State directives on a daily basis during WWI. Read about it at: https://t.co/k59pQNw2Yw
tweet.html: Diplomatic and Consular Service officers in Austria-Hungary struggled to enact Department of State directives on a daily basis during WWI. Read about it at: history.state.gov/departmenthist…
